00039 /**
00040  *  SQLiteException - Exception class for SQLite.
00041  */
00042 class SQLiteException
00043 {
00044 public:
00045         std::string m_strMessage;
00046 
00047         /** 
00048          * Constructs a SQLiteException object.
00049          * @param strMessage - The error message.
00050          */
00051         SQLiteException(const std::string& str) {m_strMessage = str;}
00052         
00053         /** 
00054          * Returns the error message.
00055          * @return - The error message string.
00056          */
00057         std::string getMessage() {return m_strMessage;}
00058 };

00100 public: 
00101         static void test();

00103          * Returns the sqlite3 reference.
00104          * @return - The sqlite3 reference.
00105          */
00106         sqlite3& getConnection() {return *m_pdb;}

00111         SQLiteRecordset* newRecordset() {return new SQLiteRecordset(*this);}

00113

00115          * Begin a transaction.
00116          */
00117         void beginTransaction() {execute("begin");}
00118 
00119         /** 
00120          * Commit a transaction.
00121          */
00122         void commitTransaction() {execute("commit");}
00123 
00124         /** 
00125          * Rollback a transaction.
00126          */
00127         void rollbackTransaction() {if (m_bOpen) {execute("rollback", false);}}
